subject: Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The American teenager Mikaela Shiffrin has been dominating the slalom circuit this season, and she can retain her World Cup title with a win Sunday if her closest rivals miss the podium.
snippet: The American teenager Mikaela Shiffrin has been dominating the slalom circuit this season, and she can retain her World Cup title with a win Sunday if her closest rivals miss the podium.
